attributes.action: set up a public website that names people (with their home addresses) who are claiming benefits and explains what they are claiming. (generic descriptions only, i.e. invalidity benefit etc.) Then if a neighbour suspects that they are claiming fraudulently they can report them to the appropriate authorities. The tax payer has a right to know where his money is going and we have to reduce the number of people in this country that have for generations, decided to live on benefits and exploit every possible loophole in the benefit system as a lifestyle choice rather than go out to work like the rest of us do..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This could reduce the number of benefit cheats by half and perhaps we would not have to be so reliant on economic migrants to do the work "we don't want to do."
